name: Daniel Chen
comment: Thank you Japan! Countless disasters and crisis we go through and we continue to support eachother!... I moved to Canada when I was 10 but will always love Taiwan, Taiwan is my home... hearing the news about outbreaks really broke my heart, but as Taiwanese fashion, the citizens acted together in unity. Then hearing the news about Japan supporting us with vaccines really brings a relief! Thank you Japan!
